//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 MinZ_MaxZRatio;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_1;
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   DNEResolution           c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio          c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled         c3       1
//   UniformPixelVector_0    c7       1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0        s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1        s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, -0.150000006, -1, 1, 9.99999975e-006
    def c5, 0.5, 0, 1, 0.0625
    def c6, 100000, 0.0399999991, -9.99999997e-007, 0.45449999
    def c8, 2, -1, -2, 0.5
    dcl_color v0.xyz
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_texcoord v2.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 v3
    dcl_texcoord4 v4
    dcl_texcoord5 v5.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-lights --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_D9C118FA_571.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    nrm_pp r0.xyz, v1
    dp3_pp r0.w, v0, v0
    rsq_pp r0.w, r0.w
    mul_pp r1.xyz, r0.w, v0.yzxw
    mul_pp r2.xyz, r0.zxyw, r1
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.yzxw, r1.yzxw, -r2
    mul_pp r1.xyz, r1, v1.w
    mad r2.xy, vPos, c0, c0.zwzw
    mul r2.xy, r2, v5.w
    texld_pp r3, v2, s2
    mad r3.xyz, r3, c8.x, c8.yyzw
    mad r3.xyz, r3, c5.x, c5.yyzw
    dp3 r1.x, r1, r3
    dp3 r1.y, r0, r3
    dp2add r0.x, c4, r1, c4.z
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c8.w
    texld r0, r0.x, s3
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0.y, v3, c7
    mul r0.w, r3.w, v3.w
    abs r1.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r3, c5.wyzw, s1
      add r1.y, -r3.y, v5.w
      mad r2.z, r3.x, r1.y, r2.x
      mov r2.w, v5.w
      mov r1.yzw, r2.xzyw
    else
      mov r1.yzw, c5.y
    endif
    mov r2.z, v5.w
    cmp r1.xyz, -r1.x, r2, r1.yzww
    rcp r1.z, r1.z
    mul r1.xy, r1.z, r1
    mad r1.xy, r1, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r1.zw, c5.y
    texldl r1, r1, s0
    add r1.x, r1.w, -c2.y
    add r1.y, -r1.x, c4.w
    rcp r1.x, r1.x
    cmp r1.x, r1.y, c6.x, r1.x
    mad r1.x, c2.x, r1.x, -v5.w
    mul_sat r1.x, r1.x, c6.y
    mul r0.w, r0.w, r1.x
    add r1.x, r0_abs.w, c6.z
    pow_pp r1.y, r0_abs.w, c6.w
    cmp_pp oC0.w, r1.x, r1.y, c5.y
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r0, v4.w, v4

// approximately 55 instruction slots used (5 texture, 50 arithmetic)
